response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is not just a purchase; it's an investment in quality, innovation, and unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, I believe its value extends well beyond $15,000. To ensure we both achieve satisfaction, I propose a special introductory offer of $18,000 for this extraordinary product. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this masterpiece could elevate your experience. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 18000}
